RumorFact.Text: Solanum wants to visit Giant's Deep, but she will probably stay on Timber Hearth as well.

ExploreFact.Text: I found Solanum observing the probe logs. I've never seen nomai computers with such a green glow. She's accessing the Main Computer to know how much time has passed.
Solanum is contemplating the Eye, and the vision seen by the inhabitants of The Stranger. She also noticed a working Memory Statue.
